A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney\, rian Johnson\, and jj abrams have ruined Star Wars. I wasn't happy with the remake of force awakens but it was well done and I get why they did it.  Even then\, it painted this new trilogy in the same corner as the original trilogy.  They should have went in new direction from the start.  Same old rebels vs empire BS. Now\, we get this overly long the last Jedi with characters we don't care about and poor treatment to Han/Luke/leia legacy.  Couldn't any of them been shown to enjoy anything after Rotj?  That's beside the point.  On any level of film criticism\, the last Jedi is not a well made movie. Slowest speed chase in movie history.   Only kind of memorable scenes were Kyle/Rey fight and Luke in the end.  This is the worst of the 9 films to date.
